channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M1
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M1

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M1 southbound between J15 and J14 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M1 southbound between junctions J15 and J14, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 5:00 am.
